root.name: Dragon Knight II
root.description: It is the second part in the Dragon Knight series. Takeru Yamato, a young adventurer who just seems to want a warm bed and a hot babe, wanders into the land of Strawberry Fields, which is ordinarily a pleasant place with beautiful women abound, but it has been swept by an evil curse: Mesaanya the sorceress has abducted all the local maidens to her tower and cast a spell causing them to do her bidding. Takeru is asked to help the girls, to which he agrees mainly because he feels they will be VERY grateful for being rescued.
